trans-unit.source: Implements the extrapolation of a manipulation's position, orientation, and average radius.

An <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D> object enables your application to extrapolate an element's location, orientation, and other properties by simulating real-world behavior.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D> objeto permite que la aplicación extrapolar la ubicación de un elemento, la orientación y otras propiedades, simulando el comportamiento real.

trans-unit.source: For instance, when a user moves an element and then releases it, the element can continue moving, decelerate, and then slowly stop.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, cuando un usuario mueve un elemento y, a continuación, lo libera, el elemento puede continuar moviendo, reducir la velocidad y, a continuación, se irá deteniendo lentamente.

trans-unit.source: An inertia processor implements this behavior by causing the affine 2-D values (origin, scale, translation, and rotation) to change over a specified time at a specified deceleration rate.
trans-unit.target: Un procesador de inercia implementa este comportamiento haciendo que los valores de 2D afines (origen, escala, traslación y rotación) cambien durante un tiempo especificado a una velocidad de desaceleración especificada.

trans-unit.source: An inertia processor by itself does not cause an element to move and decelerate.
trans-unit.target: El procesador de inercia por sí mismo no hace que un elemento mover y reducir la velocidad.

trans-unit.source: Your application receives information from an inertia processor and applies the values as needed to an application-specific element.
trans-unit.target: La aplicación recibe información de un procesador de inercia y aplica los valores según sea necesario para un elemento específico de la aplicación.

trans-unit.source: Typically, an application uses the information received from an inertia processor to change the location, size or orientation of an element.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, una aplicación usa la información recibida de un procesador de inercia para cambiar la ubicación, el tamaño o la orientación de un elemento.

trans-unit.source: Inertia processing is typically used in conjunction with manipulation processing.
trans-unit.target: El procesamiento de inercia se usa normalmente junto con el procesamiento de manipulación.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, vea la clase <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D" /> class.
The timestamp to complete extrapolation, in 100-nanosecond ticks.
Completes final extrapolation by using the specified timestamp and raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D.Completed" /> event.
Timestamps are in 100-nanosecond units.
trans-unit.target: Las marcas de tiempo están en unidades de 100 nanosegundos.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Started?displayProperty=nameWithType> event checks to see if inertia processing is running and if so, stops it by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D.Complete%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente, un controlador de eventos para el <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Started?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos comprueba si el procesamiento de inercia se está ejecutando y si es así, se detiene mediante una llamada a la <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D.Complete%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The timestamp parameter is less than the initial or previous timestamp.
Occurs when extrapolation has completed.
Occurs when the extrapolation origin has changed or when translation, scaling, or rotation have occurred.

The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D.Delta?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Delta?displayProperty=nameWithType> event are the same type.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D.Delta?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos y <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Delta?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos son del mismo tipo.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you can use the same event handler for both events.
trans-unit.target: Por lo general, puede usar el mismo controlador de eventos para ambos eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the expansion behavior of the inertia processor.
The expansion behavior of the inertia processor.
trans-unit.target: El comportamiento de expansión del procesador de inercia.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x-coordinate for the initial origin, in coordinate units.
The x-coordinate for the initial origin, in coordinate units.
trans-unit.target: La coordenada x del origen inicial, en unidades de coordenadas.

trans-unit.source: The origin point represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D.InitialOriginX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D.InitialOriginY%2A> properties is the average position of all manipulators associated with an element.
trans-unit.target: El punto de origen representada por la <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D.InitialOriginX%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D.InitialOriginY%2A> propiedades es la posición media de todos los manipuladores asociada a un elemento.

trans-unit.source: A valid value for <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D.InitialOriginX%2A> is any finite number.
trans-unit.target: Un valor válido para <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D.InitialOriginX%2A> es un número finito.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es 0.0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the y-coordinate for the initial origin, in coordinate units.
The y-coordinate for the initial origin, in coordinate units.
trans-unit.target: Coordenada y del origen inicial, en unidades de coordenadas.

trans-unit.source: The origin point represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D.InitialOriginX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D.InitialOriginY%2A> properties is the average position of all manipulators associated with an element.
trans-unit.target: El punto de origen representada por la <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D.InitialOriginX%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D.InitialOriginY%2A> propiedades es la posición media de todos los manipuladores asociada a un elemento.

trans-unit.source: A valid value for <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D.InitialOriginY%2A> is any finite number.
trans-unit.target: Un valor válido para <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D.InitialOriginY%2A> es un número finito.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es 0.0.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether inertia is currently in progress.
A Boolean value indicating whether inertia is currently in progress.
trans-unit.target: Un valor booleano que indica si la inercia está actualmente en curso.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Started?displayProperty=nameWithType> event checks to see if inertia processing is running and, if so, stops it by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D.Completed> method.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente, un controlador de eventos para el <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Started?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos comprobación si el procesamiento de inercia está ejecutando y, si es así, detiene mediante una llamada a la <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D.Completed> método.

trans-unit.source: The timestamp to perform extrapolation, in 100-nanosecond ticks.
Extrapolates the manipulation's position, orientation, and average radius at the specified time.
The manipulation's position, orientation, and average radius at the specified time.
<see langword="true" /> if extrapolation is in progress; otherwise, <see langword="false" /> if extrapolation has completed.
Timestamps are in 100-nanosecond units.
trans-unit.target: Las marcas de tiempo están en unidades de 100 nanosegundos.

trans-unit.source: The timestamp parameter is less than the initial or previous timestamp.
Gets or sets the rotation behavior of the inertia processor.
The rotation behavior of the inertia processor.
trans-unit.target: El comportamiento de rotación del procesador de inercia.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaRotationBehavior2D.DesiredRotation%2A> property is set to enable inertia processing to rotate an object three-and-one-half times from its starting orientation.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente, la <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaRotationBehavior2D.DesiredRotation%2A> propiedad se establece para habilitar el procesamiento de inercia girar un objeto tres-y-veces y Media desde su orientación inicial.

trans-unit.source: Parameters to set.
Sets parameters on the inertia processor.
Gets or sets the translation behavior of the inertia processor.
The translation behavior of the inertia processor.
trans-unit.target: El comportamiento de traslación del procesador de inercia.
